member.name: IFileSystemBindData.GetFindData
member.summary: Gets the file system information stored in the structure.
member.param: A pointer to the structure that receives the data.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData.SetFindData
member.summary: Stores file system information in a structure. This information is used by .
member.param: A pointer to the structure that specifies the data you want to store.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData
member.summary: Exposes methods that store file system information for optimizing calls to .
